precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: The Start menu will appear on the desktop.

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is visible.
expected_results: The Start Menu will close, and the Control Panel window will open in "Pick a category" view.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open and displaying the 'Pick a category' view.
action: Click the 'Switch to Classic View' link located on the left side of the window.
expected_results: The Control Panel will switch to the 'Classic View', displaying system configuration options as individual icons.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is displayed in Classic View.
action: Right Click on an empty area of the Control Panel window.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open and in Classic View.
The Windows XP Control Panel is displayed in Classic View.
action: Type the keys 'p' and 'o' to navigate to the 'Power Options' icon.
expected_results: The mouse cursor will hover over the 'Power Options' icon.

precondition: The "Power Options" icon is selected in the Control Panel.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open, displaying the "Power Schemes" tab.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu displays "After 20 mins."
action: Click the dropdown menu labeled "Turn off monitor".
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear with a list of time options.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected.
action: Click on the dropdown menu labeled "Turn off monitor" and select "Never".
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" option will display "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open and displayed in Classic View.
expected_results: The Display Properties window will open.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab in the 'Display Properties' window is open.
action: Click the down arrow next to the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of available screen savers.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab of the 'Display Properties' window is open. The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the dropdown button of the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of available screensavers.

precondition: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu in the Display Properties window is open, displaying a list of available screen savers.
action: Click the "[None]" option in the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen saver" field will display "[None]" as the selected option, and the "Settings" button will become inactive.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open, showing the 'Screen Saver' tab. The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu displays 'None'.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' window will close. The Control Panel will remain open.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open.
action: Click the close button (the 'X' in the top right corner) of the Control Panel window.
expected_results: The Control Panel window will close.
